metadata.title: CVE-2018-0502 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in zsh before 5.6. The beginning of a #! scriptfile was mishandled, potentially leading to an execve call to a programnamed on the second line.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-0502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

zsh - 5.4.2-3ubuntu3.1
zsh-common - 5.4.2-3ubuntu3.1
zsh-static - 5.4.2-3ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: zsh package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.2-3ubuntu3.1').
